body.text: To schedule a COVID-19 vaccine appointment, you will need to register with kp.org and receive a unique Medical Record Number from Kaiser Permanente. You are registering with Kaiser Permanente in Washington. If you would rather make an appointment to receive the vaccine in a different state or region, please return to our main COVID-19 vaccine page at kp.org/covidvaccine to make your selection. Please fill in the information below. All fields are required unless marked as optional.
